title: Adequate conditionals and Kripke's theory of truth
abstract:
In this paper we show how to introduce a conditional to Kripke's theory of
truth that respects the deduction theorem for the consequence relation
associated with the theory. To this effect we develop a novel supervaluational
framework, called strong Kleene supervaluation, that we take to be a promising
framework for handling the truth-conditions of non-monotone notion in the
presence of semantic indeterminacy more generally.
